texasholdem

Class TexasHoldemFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • texasholdem.TexasHoldemFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants, HoldemUI

    public class TexasHoldemFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements HoldemUI
    This is the main frame for the user interface. It is the only part of the UI that interacts with the underlying game mechanics.
    Author:
    John Wardell
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
